title: Olinda Playspace
description: Huge amazing new playspace. Sand, water, shade, coffee van. Nearby dog offleash area.

title: Belgrave Lake Park
description: Newly renovated with bonus dog park and basketball court AND just down the beautiful forest track from Jon and Caro.

title: Ferny Creek Playground
description: Cute little playground. Often quiet, often shady, fenced, nearby dog offleash area and cool walk with emus sometimes.

title: Emerald Lake Park
description: Huge lakeside park. Ducks, picnic areas, walking tracks, paddle boating, you can watch Puffing Bill take off too!

title: Cameo Cinema
description: Cute retro cinema. New movies, classics, marathons. Outdoor cinema!

title: Lunar Drive In Cinema
description: Not technically the hills, but not too far. Fun times!
